languages.text: "По опыту знаю, этих издалека не пробьешь — щиты слишком крепкие. Нужно стрелять в упор".
"I can say from experience that we won't crack their defences from far off, their shields are too tough. We will have to close in and fire practically at point-blank range."
languages.original_text: "По опыту знаю, этих издалека не пробьешь — щиты слишком крепкие. Нужно стрелять в упор".

traits.locale_text: "I can say from experience that we won't crack their defences from far off, their shields are too tough. We will have to close in and fire practically at point-blank range."
"I can say from experience that we won't crack their defences from far off, their shields are too tough. We will have to close in and fire practically at point-blank range."
"I can say from experience that we won't crack their defences from far off, their shields are too tough. We will have to close in and fire practically at point-blank range."
"I can say from experience that we won't crack their defences from far off, their shields are too tough. We will have to close in and fire practically at point-blank range."
"I can say from experience that we won't crack their defences from far off, their shields are too tough. We will have to close in and fire practically at point-blank range."

languages.text: “根据我的经验，我们恐怕无法从远处突破他们的防御。他们的护盾实在是太结实了，要是想干掉他们，恐怕只能近距离射击。”
languages.original_text: "I can say from experience that we won't crack their defences from far off, their shields are too tough. We will have to close in and fire practically at point-blank range."

traits.locale_text: “根据我的经验，我们恐怕无法从远处突破他们的防御。他们的护盾实在是太结实了，要是想干掉他们，恐怕只能近距离射击。”

languages.text: "Ich kann aus Erfahrung sagen, dass wir ihre Verteidigung aus der Distanz nicht ausschalten können, dafür sind ihre Schilde zu stark. Wir müssen den Abstand verringern und aus allernächster Nähe feuern."
languages.original_text: "I can say from experience that we won't crack their defences from far off, their shields are too tough. We will have to close in and fire practically at point-blank range."

traits.locale_text: "Ich kann aus Erfahrung sagen, dass wir ihre Verteidigung aus der Ferne nicht ausschalten können, dafür sind ihre Schilde zu stark. Wir müssen den Abstand verringern und aus allernächster Nähe feuern."

languages.text: « Je peux vous dire d'expérience que nous ne parviendrons jamais à briser leurs boucliers à cette distance, ils sont bien trop puissants. Il faut nous rapprocher et tirer pratiquement à bout portant. »
languages.original_text: "I can say from experience that we won't crack their defences from far off, their shields are too tough. We will have to close in and fire practically at point-blank range."

traits.locale_text: « Je peux vous dire d'expérience que nous ne parviendrons jamais à briser leurs boucliers à cette distance, ils sont bien trop puissants. Il faut nous rapprocher et tirer pratiquement à bout portant. »

languages.text: «Por experiencia, puedo decirle que no atravesaremos sus defensas desde lejos, sus escudos son demasiado poderosos. Tendremos que acercarnos y disparar prácticamente a bocajarro».
languages.original_text: "I can say from experience that we won't crack their defences from far off, their shields are too tough. We will have to close in and fire practically at point-blank range."

traits.locale_text: «Por experiencia, puedo decirle que no atravesaremos sus defensas desde lejos, sus escudos son demasiado poderosos. Tendremos que acercarnos y disparar prácticamente a bocajarro».

languages.text: 「経験上、奴らのシールドは非常に頑丈で、遠距離からではその護りを破ることはできないと言える。近づいて至近距離から攻撃するしかない」
languages.original_text: "I can say from experience that we won't crack their defences from far off, their shields are too tough. We will have to close in and fire practically at point-blank range."

traits.locale_text: 「経験上、奴らのシールドは非常に頑丈で、遠距離からではその護りを破ることはできないと言える。近づいて至近距離から攻撃するしかない」

languages.text: "Tecrübelerimden biliyorum, savunmalarını uzaktan çökertmek imkânsız. Kalkanları çok sağlamdır. Diplerine girip yakın mesafeden ateş etmemiz gerekecek."
languages.original_text: "I can say from experience that we won't crack their defences from far off, their shields are too tough. We will have to close in and fire practically at point-blank range."
